NPC.name: wyvern
NPC.description: The flying reptile is clad in pale blue and purple scales from head to tailtip. That tailtip extending some seven feet from its nose if it were to stretch out. It's body is slender and light though for all its length. Perched on its hindlegs it flexes out its leathery wing membranes, thrashes its tail and raises its crest in a threat display. The display accompanied with a threatening hiss crackle pop as it vocalizes its hostile intention and electrical arcs snap out a few inches from its jaws. It's clearly a mean critter.
